name: Gun Farming
description:
Controls:

WASD or ↑←↓→: Movement

I: Inventory

E: Use (press again to close Menus)

Esc: Quit (during game)

Summary:

Play as Chance, a friendly farmer, who lives a simple life of planting, watering and tending to his crops, all of which are guns and ammo. Plant seeds, water then sleep, and wake up to see your plants grow! It is a very simple game, made in the span of a single month, made by one person. Hope you enjoy!
